Okay. Let’s go with that.

Beast Mastery Hunters are statistically the most frequently top-ranked class on WotLK, consistently achieving high DPS numbers across various content. However, this doesn't inherently make them “the best.” It reflects a specific design and player skill ceiling that many find engaging. 

Furthermore, the class’s reliance on a complex, constantly shifting encounter – the raptor – can be incredibly frustrating for some players. Success is heavily dependent on precise timing, resource management, and a deep understanding of the encounter mechanics. 

Ultimately, “best” is subjective and depends on individual playstyle and preferences.
